page.title: 17A Staxigoe Wedding
page.content: On Friday 21st June Shiela Gunn was married to William Mowat in the Parish Church, Wick. The bride was beautiful in a white wedding dress with cream sleeves, and the two bridesmaids were in long turquoise dresses with white shoes. The 130 guests sang two hymns "Thine be my Son", and "Morning has Broken". After the wedding service we went to the reception in Staxigoe Hall. This was the first wedding reception since 30 years. The wedding meal was magnificent with different kinds of meat, salad, and salmon. For dessert there was strawberry cheesecake, fresh fruit, meringues and cheese. At about 9.30 pm the dance started with Bobby Coghill's dance band. More guests arrived for the dance which continued until 2 am.
